EmailTemplate.description: The trigger for this email is any new lead that is submitted under the program will get this initial email
EmailTemplate.name: Lead Seeker - New Lead received MPB
EmailTemplate.subject: Seeker Rewards Program – New lead received! {!Lead.Lead_Number__c} for {!Lead.Company}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.First_Name_Formula__c},
Thank you for submitting a MyPost Business lead.
Please note that MyPost Business leads will not be called, instead an automated email with information on MyPost Business has been sent to the customer.
You will be awarded 100 points if the customer registers for MyPost Business within 15 business days. If the new MyPost Business customer has business spend within the first 8 weeks of registering, additional points will be awarded.
For more information about MyPost Business leads and rewards please see the Seeker FAQs.
Thanks again and keep those great leads coming.
Regards, The Seeker Team
